programme.title: Deaths of tourists in Florida
programme.short_synopsis: The deaths of 9 tourists in 1992 lead Florida to suspend tourism advertising.
programme.medium_synopsis: Florida stops all tourism advertising after the deaths of 9 foreign visitors in 1992, Alistair Cooke considers the scale of the threat and the amplifying effect of television.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Deaths of tourists in Florida

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
